article.title: Status and history for nep
article.para: Some of the text provided by Allen Bailochan Tuladhar (preamble, articles 1-5, 8-18) seem to differ from the OHCHR text.

history.history-entry: ISO 639-3 nep covers a group of languages and has been changed to a macrolanguge. Switching to the most widely spoken language, npi, “Nepali”.
stage 4: missing articles provided by Arthur Reutenauer.
stage 3: provided by Allen Bailochan Tuladhar via the Language Observatory.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
